sentences.en: All our apple varieties are variations on the one old Eurasian apple.
sentences.cn: 所有苹果树的变种都是一种古老的欧亚苹果树的变种.

sentences.en: Earlier Eurasian Natural Resources Corporation said that the for further production cuts.
sentences.cn: 稍早时欧亚天然资源公司表示,无需进一步削减产量.

sentences.en: Eurasian aromatic oak - leaved goosefoot with many yellow - green flowers; naturalized North America.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的一种芬芳的象叶藜属植物,花呈黄色至绿色; 在北美归化.

sentences.en: Eurasian evergreen thorny shrubs bearing red or orange - red berries.
sentences.cn: 长出红的或橘子红的浆果的欧亚的长青多刺灌木.

sentences.en: Eurasian garden perennial having scarlet flowers in dense terminal heads.
sentences.cn: 在茂密的叶柄端部开猩红色花的一种欧亚多年生园林植物.

sentences.en: Eurasian marten having a brown coat with pale breast and throat.
sentences.cn: 欧亚大陆的貂,褐色皮毛,雄部和喉部为苍白色.

sentences.en: Eurasian perennial herbs having daisylike flowers with yellow rays and dark centers.
sentences.cn: 欧亚的一种四季生草本植物,花类似雏菊,花缘黄色、花心黑色.

sentences.en: Eurasian pigeon with white patches on wings and neck.
sentences.cn: 欧亚大陆翼和尾上有白色斑点的鸽子.

sentences.en: Eurasian pink widely cultivated for its flat - topped dense clusters of varicolored flowers.
sentences.cn: 广泛种植的平顶、密集、多色串状花瓣的欧亚石竹.

sentences.en: Eurasian primrose with yellow flowers clustered in a one - sided umbel.
sentences.cn: 欧亚报春花,花黄色,丛生于单侧的伞形花序.

sentences.en: Eurasian thistle growing in sand dunes and dry chalky soils.
sentences.cn: 在沙丘或干旱白垩土壤中生长的欧亚蓟.

sentences.en: Eurasian tulip with small flowers blotched at the base.
sentences.cn: 一种产于欧亚的郁金香,花小,有带有白边的红色花被.

sentences.en: On that date they had been on Eurasian soil.
sentences.cn: 那一天他们都在欧亚国境内.

sentences.en: The border between the N American and Eurasian Plates does not subduct.
sentences.cn: 北美板块和欧亚板块之间的边界地区不会俯冲潜没,也不会滑动.

sentences.en: The name of the hotel vas " The Grand Eurasian Hotel. "
sentences.cn: 旅馆名叫 “ 欧亚大旅社 ”.

trans.tran_en: relating to both Europe and Asia
